mapper.insert: insert swapwrite (id, title, textarea,loginId, request,idDate, currentTime, endTime) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{textarea}, #{loginId}, 1, #{idDate}, #{currentTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.select: select s.number,s.loginId, s.title, s.textarea, s.request from user u inner join swapwrite s on u.id = s.id
